= Quick start, protobuf-javame =

  # [http://code.google.com/p/protobuf-javame/downloads/list]Download the latest version add the protobuf-javame.jar to your project.
  # Use the proto2javame.jar to generate the source code from your proto-file. Command: 'java -jar proto2javame.jar --java_out=<generated-source-folder> <path to your proto-file>'
  # Use the generated builder object to read/write the populated object: 'generatedObject.writeTo(...)' 'MyGeneratedObject generatedObject = MyGeneratedObject.parseFrom(...)'
